university_name: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
module_restrictions: Please check with your home School or Faculty's Dean's Office.
visa_info: International exchange students will apply for an F1 visa. This visa will allow you to enter the US 30 days prior to the program start date listed on your I-20 form and depart the US 60 days after the program end date listed on your I-20 form.

on_campus_housing: International students can select from the 31 campus residence halls. Double occupancy rooms are the only option. Apartment style housing is limited. Click here for additional housing information.
accommodations_info.off_campus_housing: International students can reside in off campus housing. You would be responsible for identifying the type of housing and make the necessary arrangements.
accommodations_info.meals_info: Students are not required to purchase a campus meal plan, but it is strongly recommended. Several meal plan options are available that can meet a student's dining habits. Click here for details and description of the various meal plan options.

cost_of_living.estimated_monthly_living_expenses:
Please refer to the following link for an estimated cost of living at UNC: 
http://studentaid.unc.edu/cost-of-attendance/undergraduate/
(Tuition fees are waived for exchange students)

university_description: The University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill is a public research university in Chapel Hill, North Carolina. It is one of the 17 campuses of the University of North Carolina system.
location_cost_of_living: The cost of living in the city of Chapel Hill, North Carolina is generally affordable for students.
location_weather: The climate of Chapel Hill is characterized by hot and humid summers and mild winters.
location_description: Chapel Hill is a college town in North Carolina which is known for its history, music, and friendly atmosphere.
location_crime: Chapel Hill is considered to be a safe city to live in.
location_transportation: The transportation options in Chapel Hill include buses, taxis, and ride-sharing services.
location_halal: Halal food options are available in Chapel Hill.
location_vegetarian: Vegetarian food options are available in Chapel Hill.
